          <title>
            <string language="en">Daffodils appear black</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Narzissen sehen schwarz aus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les jonquilles semblent noires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os daffodils parecem pretos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I daffodils sembrano neri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Daffodils εμφανίζεται μαύρο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los narcisos aparecen negros</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of a series of two pictures discussing the action of a filter. This illustration shows a daffodil appearing black as seen through a blue filter.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">black</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blue filter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">daffodils</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von einer Reihe von zwei Abbildungen, 
welche die Tätigkeit eines Filters behandeln. Diese Abbildung 
zeigt eine Narzisse, die schwarz aussieht, wie durch einen blauen 
Filter gesehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord d'une série de deux images discutant 
l'action d'un filtre. Cette illustration montre une jonquille 
semblant noire comme vu par un filtre bleu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de uma série de dois retratos que 
discutem a ação de um filtro. Esta ilustração mostra um 
daffodil que parece preto como visto através de um filtro azul.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di una serie di due immagini che 
discutono l'azione di un filtro. Questa illustrazione mostra un 
daffodil che sembra nero come visto tramite un filtro blu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα μιας σειράς δύο εικόνων που συζητούν την 
ενέργεια ενός φίλτρου. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα 
daffodil που εμφανίζεται μαύρο όπως βλέπει μέσω ενός 
μπλε φίλτρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de una serie de dos cuadros que discuten 
la acción de un filtro. Esta ilustración muestra un narciso 
que aparece negro según lo considerado a través de un filtro azul.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Filter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwarzes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">blauer Filter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Narzissen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
